articles.author: Vanessa Gera
articles.title: Migrants camp overnight at Polish border after tense day - Associated Press
articles.description: WARSAW, Poland (AP) — Polish riot police and coils of razor wire faced off Tuesday against migrants, including families with young children, who were camped just across the border in Belarus, amid a tense standoff on the European Union's eastern border.
